summary: Completed testing of PowerLeave leave management SaaS. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% pass rate), but frontend integration is blocked by CORS configuration issue preventing login and dashboard access.

critical_bugs.issue: Backend CORS middleware has wildcard origins '*' with credentials=True, which blocks all frontend API calls from localhost:3000
critical_bugs.technical_details: Error: 'Access-Control-Allow-Origin' header cannot be wildcard '*' when request's credentials mode is 'include'

integration_issues.issue: All API calls from frontend to backend are blocked by CORS policy
integration_issues.impact: Complete frontend functionality breakdown - no user can login or use the application

passed_tests: Landing page loads with rocket logo and blue branding
Demo credentials banner visible on landing and login pages
Login page navigation from landing page
Login form renders correctly with demo credentials pre-filled suggestion
All 14 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Demo admin and user authentication via direct API

action_item_for_main_agent.critical_fix_required: Fix CORS configuration in backend server.py
action_item_for_main_agent.impact: Without this fix, the entire frontend is non-functional as no API calls can be made
action_item_for_main_agent.test_verification: After fix, user should be able to login with admin@demo.it/demo123 and access dashboard with stats and pending requests

success_percentage.frontend: 20% - UI renders but no functionality due to CORS blocking all API calls
success_percentage.integration: 0% - Complete failure due to CORS issue
